website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality fishing kayak that is affordable and especially good for taller paddlers.
pros: Good stable hull and plenty of space make for an excellent leisure or angling boat
Adjustable backrest and leg padding add comfort
Plenty of storage and space for accessories
cons: Would be nice to have a paddle holder

customer_reviews.title: Good Kayak, comfortable, lacking a key feature
customer_reviews.text: I had never had a kayak before, and had bought a Perception Sound 10.5 and a Perception Pescador 10. The Sound was very comfortable, and stable. The only downside is that the paddle holder, that used to be included, and is shown in some of the pictures, is no longer a standard feature for this kayak. I had to buy a clip, add a bungee, to create this feature. Not sure why they would discontinue a great feature, since this is marketed as a recreational/fishing kayak. If you are going to fish, you need to secure the paddle somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Great stable knock around boat
customer_reviews.text: Great boat for what it is, certainly not a kayak for long lake paddles, paddles like a barge above moderate power,but we wanted something we could knock around in gravel creeks with, it is durable, tracks well, and is very stable...couldn't ask for more for the job, look for something sleeker and longer if you are going to do more mileage
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a Field and Stream 12' from Dicks that wore a hole through the thin flooring. First time out my husband caught 18 fish - he was very happy. We hoped the groves on the bottom would help keep the tracking straight but it still moved more than his old 12' kayak but it handled well overall. He liked being able to turn easier. This is no frills so be ready to trick out with your own, better formed, rod holders. The milk crate groove in the back is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty decent for the price but there are better kayaks
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt track very straight but, that could also just be me. I think the seat is very comfortable and it feels sturdy. It's not very fast
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS KAYAK!
customer_reviews.text: This Yak is fantastic! Tracks well, very stable. The material is very dense which makes for a stiffer kayak than most others. Cuts through the water well. Cargo room is great. Stop reading this and just buy it already.... TOTALLY WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Xterra Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Nice kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak had some issues from freight company , miner fixes no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: good quality fishing kayak
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the 320 I paid. All it needs is a softer seat
customer_reviews.author: joeJ69

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for the price, durable & stable with some nice little features. I kayak rivers and coastal in Florida with my 3yo & it holds both of us very easily . (240lbs total) Would definetly buy another . Also cant go wrong made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: Stable & fun kayak
customer_reviews.text: Had this kayak out on the lake today and it handled beautifully! Tracked straight and was super fun to paddle! Felt very stable the entire time out on the water!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Krick

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Solo rod mount missing from packaging... Onlything delivered was the kayak... Hoping the sender with send out the missing rod mount.. Other than that the kayak is perfect and just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a awesome looking well built tuff kayak, buy this! I’ve gone about 15 miles in this so far and love it. Gotten lots of compliments on it too
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: strings
customer_reviews.text: I just got to use my kayak and there are no strings in them to keep my belongings from floating away
customer_reviews.author: Kris Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and spent 4 hours on the lake first time out. Absolutely love it. I had never kayaked before so I don't have anything to compare it to but am very happy with the purchase. BTW, I am 6' 4" tall and weigh about 215. It fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: GHood

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stable and comfortable riding kayak. I also like the roomy seat opening, which makes it comfortable for a larger person. It tracks very well too. The length is perfect. We used it for a slow moving and swift moving creek...didn’t dump it 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Perception Sound 10.5 | Sit Inside Kayak for Fishing and Fun | Two Rod Holders | Large Rear Storage | 10' 6"
feature_bullets: The best value in sit-inside kayak fishing for larger paddlers; also great for general recreational use
The Sound dashboard includes two mounting points for our Solo Mount accessory system
Tri-keel hull creates ultimate stability and smooth steering
Extra cushy ergonomic Zone Seat with adjustable backrest for optimal support and comfort.Deck Height: 15.75 inch
Quick-adjust footrests accommodate paddlers of all sizes
Two molded-in fishing rod holders and large rear open storage area for easy access to cooler, fishing crate and gear
Front and rear molded-in handles provide comfort and lockable security
Boat Weight: 46 lbs. - Maximum Capacity: 335 lbs.
